name: conference-crm
description: CRM for Bulk Emails, Follow-up & SMTP Integration

scripts.server: cd server && set PORT=3001 && node index.js
scripts.client: cd client && set PORT=5000 && set HOST=0.0.0.0 && set DANGEROUSLY_DISABLE_HOST_CHECK=true && set WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 && npm start
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
